title: BRIEF-Investec Australia Property Says Co Successfully Completes A$84 Mln Placement
text:
BRIEF-Investec Australia Property Says Co Successfully Completes A$84 Mln Placement

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 09:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Investec Australia Property Says Co Successfully Completes A$84 Mln Placement Sept 27 (Reuters) - Investec Australia Property Fund IAP.AX : * SUCCESSFULLY COMPLETES A$84 MILLION PLACEMENT THROUGH ISSUANCE OF 55.6 MILLION NEW UNITS AT ISSUE PRICE OF A$1.52 PER UNIT * PROCEEDS OF PLACEMENT TO FUND ACQUISITION OF THREE INDUSTRIAL PROPERTIES FOR A$81 MILLION BY SUB TRUSTS OF CO

BRIEF-Investec Australia Property Says Co Successfully Completes A$84 Mln Placement
description: BRIEF-Investec Australia Property Says Co Successfully Completes A$84 Mln Placement
